data.description:
Drum simulator and note highway rhythm games that you can add your own music. Free style on the realistic VR like drum kit, play MP3's, or try for a high score on the note highway. (Must add your own music)

- VR Hardware drum kit
- VR Electronic drum kit pads
- Fun rhythm games
- Customizable VR drum simulator.

In-game Quest file browser .MP3/.OGG/.WAV audio player.

Position your drum hardware or eKit pad layout. Modify each drums sound by using different drum heads, cymbals, hi-hats etc.

Bonus
Tenor drum harness and tenor drums included. Marching band drums.

- Save or load your kit
- Pressure sensitive hits
- Bass and hi-hat foot pedals (VR Controller)
- Bass and hi-hat foot pedals (Connect USB Pedal/Gamepad)
- Multiple locations
- Change drums sounds and look

Drum Hardware Included:
8 snare drums, 5 bass drums, also an amped bass drum, 5 crash cymbals, 2 ride cymbals, 3 splash cymbals, tom drums 6", 8", 10", 12", 14". A roto tom rack 6", 8", 10" roto toms, 4 different hi-hats (rock, 50's, metal trash etc), china cymbals, dry ride/crash, custom china stack, mounted tambourine, cow bells, steelpan drum and more.

Test Include:
- Liv.tv

Note: 
The note highway supports .chart drum charts with music. Custom music and drum charts (.chart files and song folders) must be added by yourself.
